overview.actions.dev_mode.description: Temporarily bypass our cache. See changes to your origin server in realtime.
overview.actions.enable_uam.description: Under Attack Mode will temporarily pause access to %{zoneName} and impact your site analytics. When enabled, visitors will see an interstitial page. It is designed to be used as a last resort.
overview.actions.title: Actions
overview.actions.uam_switch.description: Show visitors a JavaScript challenge when they visit your site.
overview.advanced_actions.modal.remove_s:
This will cancel all active subscriptions, which will not be refunded. If you add this domain back to Cloudflare later, you will need to re-purchase all subscriptions. This does not change your domain registration.

Consider pausing %{zoneName} and monitoring performance before removing it.
Learn more about disconnecting from Cloudflare
overview.advanced_actions.pause.descript:
This stops traffic for %{zoneName} from passing through the Cloudflare network, making your origin server IP address visible and turning off all other protections.

Consider turning on u201CDevelopment Modeu201D to bypass caching while preserving protection.
overview.advanced_actions.pause.title: Pause %{zoneName}?
overview.advanced_actions.title: Advanced Actions
overview.analytics_preview.title: Analytics Preview

To activate %{zone}, add this TXT record to the root record for validation
overview.dns_update_panel.cname.title: We could not verify your TXT record
overview.dns_update_panel.cname.update_n: Cloudflare will automatically re-check your TXT record. If your TXT record is correct, your site will be immediately activated. Please allow up to 6 hours for this change to be processed.
<0>Registrars take up to 24 hours to process nameserver changes (quicker in most cases). We will email you when %{zone} is active on Cloudflare.</0>
While in this <0>pending state</0>, Cloudflare will respond to DNS queries on your assigned nameservers.
Once activated, SSL/TLS, DDoS protection, caching, and other automatic optimizations will go live for proxied DNS records, along with any custom settings you pre-configure.
overview.dns_update_panel.incomplete_set: This process makes Cloudflare your authoritative <1>DNS provider</1>, allowing your DNS queries and web traffic to be served from and protected by our <3>global network.</3>

In most cases, this process will not cause downtime, but you may skip this for now to double-check <0>your DNS records</0> and pre-configure other settings before activating (you can find these instructions again later on the <1>Overview</1> page).
In most cases, this process will not cause downtime, but you may skip this for now to double-check <0>your DNS records</0> and pre-configure other settings before activating.
%{zone} is not yet active on Cloudflare.
Update the <1>nameservers</1> at your <3>registrar</3> to activate Cloudflare services for this domain.
%{zone} is not active on Cloudflare yet
Adding Cloudflare's secondary nameservers is critical for activating your site successfully. Otherwise, Cloudflare is unable to manage your DNS and optimize your site.
overview.dns_update_panel.moved.descript: %{zone} has moved and is no longer active on Cloudflare.
overview.dns_update_panel.moved.title: Update your nameserver setup
overview.dns_update_panel.ns.automatic_r: Cloudflare periodically checks for nameserver updates. To initiate a nameserver check now, **Check nameservers**.
Cloudflare will periodically check for nameserver updates.
overview.dns_update_panel.ns.error_messa: The verification for the nameservers of %{zoneName} is already being re-checked. You may only submit a re-check once per hour.
overview.dns_update_panel.partial.error_: The verification for the TXT record of %{zoneName} is already being re-checked. You may only submit a re-check once per hour.
overview.dns_update_panel.ns.help.descri: Read our <0>step-by-step instructions</0> or <1>visit our support portal</1>.

overview.dns_update_panel.ns.help.title: Need help?
overview.dns_update_panel.ns.label: Nameserver %{index}
overview.dns_update_panel.ns.queued_mess: Cloudflare is now checking the nameservers for %{zoneName}. Please wait a few hours for an update.
overview.dns_update_panel.partial.queued: Cloudflare is now checking your TXT record for %{zoneName}. Please wait a few hours for an update.
overview.dns_update_panel.dnssec.avoid_d: Avoid DNS resolution issues caused by <1>DNSSEC</1>
overview.dns_update_panel.dnssec.look_at: Find the DNSSEC setting at your registrar (<1>per-provider instructions</1>). If it is <3>on</3>, you have two options:
overview.dns_update_panel.dnssec.turn_of: <0>Turn DNSSEC off</0> at least 24 hours before updating your nameservers. <2>Most common</2>
overview.dns_update_panel.dnssec.migrate: <0>Migrate your existing DNS zone without turning off DNSSEC.</0> <1>More advanced</1>
overview.dns_update_panel.dnssec.recomme: After your domain activates, we recommend <1>turning DNSSEC on</1> through Cloudflare.
overview.dns_update_panel.update_nameser: Find the list of nameservers at your registrar. Add both of your assigned Cloudflare nameservers, remove any other nameservers, and save your changes.
overview.dns_update_panel.add_nameserver: 2. Add Cloudflareu2019s Secondary Nameservers in addition to the existing nameservers at your registrar:
overview.modal.under_attack_mode.descrip: Under Attack Mode will temporarily pause access to %{zoneName} and impact analytics. When enabled, visitors are shown an interstitial security check. It is designed to be used as a last resort.
overview.modal.under_attack_mode_active_: Under Attack mode is now active
Visitors to %{zoneName} are shown an interstitial security check, impacting user experience and analytics. Disable Under Attack mode once you are no longer under a DDoS attack.
[Cloudflare cache](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/:zone/caching) is temporarily bypassed and cached files are not purged, so you can immediately observe changes to cacheable content.

<0>About Development Mode</0>
overview.modal.development_mode.question: Enable Development Mode?
overview.modal.development_mode_active_c: [Cloudflare cache](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/:zone/caching) is temporarily bypassed and cached files are not purged, so you can immediately observe changes to cacheable content. Expires in 3 hours.
overview.modal.dev_mode.description: Enabling Development Mode turns off caching for your site. All requests will be fetched from the origin server. Cloudflare will continue proxying traffic to your origin server without caching any content. Are you sure you want to continue?
overview.modal.block_ai_bots.description: This will enable Bot Fight Mode to help protect your site from automated traffic, including AI crawlers and bots that consume resources without permission. This may challenge or block some legitimate automated traffic. Are you sure you want to continue?
overview.modal.paused.title: Un-pause Cloudflare services
overview.modal.paused.content: Traffic for %{zoneName} is no longer routed through the Cloudflare network. This exposes your origin server's IP address and disables all other protections. <0>About pausing Cloudflare</0>
overview.modal.zone_hold.description: Release the hold on this zone and allow other accounts to create zones using this hostname for...
overview.notification.title: Notifications
overview.page.title: Overview
overview.product_discovery.title: Product Discovery
overview.product_discovery.subtitle: Discover more of what Cloudflare has to offer and review the products you're already using.
overview.product_discovery.footer.billin: For more billing information, visit the <0>billing page</0>.
overview.product_discovery.footer.discla: * Pricing shown reflects the total charge to your account for the product, based on the current configuration across all zones in your account.
overview.product_discovery.error: Failed to load the list of products. Please try again later.
overview.product_discovery.products.cert: Edge Certificates are automatically generated and propagate throughout our global content delivery network, providing robust encryption, along with lightning fast performance and compatibility.
overview.product_discovery.products.page: Page Rules let you control which Cloudflare settings trigger on a given URL. Includes %{count} page rules with Free plan. Additional rules %{price} per month.
Page Rules let you control which Cloudflare settings trigger on a given URL. Includes %{count} page rules with Pro plan. Additional rules %{price} per month.
Page Rules let you control which Cloudflare settings trigger on a given URL. Includes %{count} page rules with Business plan. Additional rules %{price} per month.
overview.product_discovery.products.argo: Argo is a service that uses optimized routes across the Cloudflare network to deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely. Argo includes Smart Routing, Tunnel, and Tiered Caching.
overview.product_discovery.products.load: Load Balancing safeguards from service disruptions with local and global traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover, ensuring the continuous availability of your critical resources.
overview.product_discovery.products.rate: Rate Limiting protects against denial-of-service attacks, brute-force password attempts, and other types of abusive behavior targeting the application layer.
overview.product_discovery.products.regi: Cloudflare Registrar securely registers and manages your domain names with transparent, no-markup pricing that eliminates surprise renewal fees and hidden add-on charges.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.0r: Improves site performance for previous site visitors. This most benefits end users who visit an application regularly or who use mobile networks.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.ac: Review these <0>basic features</0> and select which ones to activate.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.al: Increase security by redirecting all your visitor requests from http to https.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.br: Increases security by looking for common HTTP headers abused most commonly by spammers and denies access to your page. It also challenges visitors without a user agent or with a non-standard user agent such as commonly used by abusive bots, crawlers, or visitors.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.de: Activate %{total} core speed and security features included in your %{plan}.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.ed: Use the toggles to turn <0>basic features</0> on or off.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.gr: Increased security by helping to protect APIs on any proxied gRPC endpoints. Only benefit to customers if they are using gRPC protocols but no risk if they are not using it.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.ho: Prevents your images from being used by other sites, which can reduce the bandwidth consumed by your origin server.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.ht: Secures communications and improves page load times.
Allow HTTP/2 requests between Cloudflare's edge and your origin to improve performance.
Accelerate page loads by enabling visitorsu2019 browsers and web servers to communicate as efficiently as possible.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.op: Increases security by ensuring Tor network users can no longer access sites via exit nodes which can be compromised and helps only serve challenges to malicious bot traffic.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.tl: Secures communications and improves page load times.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.ur: Modifies the URLs of incoming requests so that they conform to a consistent formatting standard.
overview.quick_actions.basic_features.we: Protect WebSocket connections which increase connection speeds by enabling the client and the origin to pass data back and forth without having to reestablish sessions. Only benefit to customers if they are using the underlying technology but no risk if they are not using it.
Web analytics using real user measurement (RUM)

Measure your traffic in a privacy-first way, to optimize speed tools for your site. One-click activation will deploy a JavaScript beacon on your site automatically. Alternatively, you can add the JS beacon to your site manually.
overview.quick_actions.dev_mode.descript: Temporarily bypass our cache. See changes to your origin server in realtime.
overview.quick_actions.bot_management.de: Prevent AI crawlers from scraping content for training without your permission.
overview.quick_actions.bot_management.ai: Deploys a Cloudflare-managed rule to block bots that we categorize as AI training crawlers from visiting your site.
See the list of bots and learn more
overview.quick_actions.bot_management.ro: Instruct AI bot traffic with robots.txt
Creates or updates your robots.txt file to signal that your content should not be used for AI training. This does not impact SEO.
overview.quick_actions.purge_cache.descr: Fetch fresh versions of one or more files from your web server.
overview.quick_actions.speed_test.descri: Benchmark your service to identify opportunities to improve performance.
overview.quick_actions.title: Quick Actions
overview.quick_actions.uam_switch.descri: Show visitors a JavaScript challenge when they visit your site.
Show your site visitors a JavaScript challenge once your domain is active on Cloudflare.
overview.quick_actions.zone_hold.descrip: Prevent the addition of this domain in other accounts.
overview.quick_actions.zone_hold.include: Prevent creation of subdomains and custom hostnames.
overview.quick_actions.zone_hold.release: Zone hold scheduled to re-enable at %{timeUTC} on %{date}.
overview.quick_start_guide.subheading.m2: Configure your domain settings to improve security, optimize performance, and get the most from your account.
One-click settings to further optimize security and performance.
overview.quick_start_guide.subheading.m3: Configure your website settings to improve security, optimize performance, and get the most from your plan.

overview.status_panel.abuse.description: We have detected a possible violation of our Terms of Service.

overview.status_panel.analytics.title: Analytics are temporarily unavailable
overview.status_panel.development_mode.d: **Development Mode is active.** Caching for this website has been disabled. Expires in %{expires}.

overview.status_panel.inactive.descripti: **Your website is not active on Cloudflare.** You have critical activation steps to complete. u201CReview Settingsu201D to finish activation.
overview.status_panel.paused.description: Web traffic to this website is no longer receiving performance and security benefits. Cloudflare continues to resolve the DNS. You can reactivate Cloudflare for this website at anytime. <0>Resume Cloudflare on Site</0>

**Your site is paused.** Web traffic to this website is no longer receiving performance and security benefits. Cloudflare continues to resolve the DNS. You can reactivate Cloudflare for this website at anytime. <0>Resume Cloudflare on Site</0>
overview.status_panel.paused.title: Your site is paused
overview.status_panel.phishing.descripti: **Your domain has been suspected of phishing or malware.** Please review the identified items below. When you have removed the malicious content, you may request a review by our Trust & Safety team.
Please review the identified items below. When you have removed the malicious content, you may request a review by our Trust & Safety team.

overview.status_panel.under_attack.descr: **Under Attack Mode is active.** Under Attack mode is used when a website is under a DDoS attack. All visitors will be shown an interstitial page for a short duration.
Under Attack mode is used when a website is under a DDoS attack. All visitors will be shown an interstitial page for a short duration.

overview.zone_promo.cache_analytics.body: Go beyond "cached" and "uncached" stats: see if resources are missing cache, expired, or are never eligible for cache in the first place.
overview.zone_promo.health_checks.title: Health Checks
overview.zone_promo.health_checks.body: Actively monitor your servers and avoid downtime.
overview.zone_promo.load_balancing.title: Load Balancing
overview.zone_promo.load_balancing.body1: Uninterrupted traffic. No matter what the internet throws at you.
overview.zone_promo.load_balancing.body2: Maximize your application performance and availability.
overview.zone_promo.faster_support.title: Faster Support
overview.zone_promo.faster_support.body: Upgrade to the Pro or Business plan for faster email and 24/7 chat support.
overview.zone_promo.argo.title: Argo
overview.zone_promo.argo.body: Deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely. Reduce Internet latency by up to 30%.
overview.zone_promo.no_more_recommendati: You've reached the end of your recommendations.
More recommendations will be added here as they become available.
overview.active_trust_safety_blocks.titl: Your domain has content that has been blocked.
overview.active_trust_safety_blocks.subt: Please review the items below that have been blocked as potential Terms of Service violations. Once you have removed the content, or if you believe the block to be in error, you can request that Cloudflare's Trust & Safety team remove the block.
overview.active_trust_safety_blocks.revi: A review is pending. If approved, Cloudflare will remove the block.
overview.active_trust_safety_blocks.moda: Cloudflare places blocks on paths that lead to content that is in violation of our Terms of Service. Access can be restored to the path if the content has been removed, or if itu2019s found the block has been made in error.
Select your reason for requesting review:
I have examined the content and believe the restriction to be in error.
I attest that I have removed the content.
free_trial.promo.pro: Try the Pro plan free for 30 days
free_trial.promo.biz: Try the Business plan free for 30 days

free_trial.cancel_warning_biz.title: You cannot purchase %{productName} while on a Business plan trial
free_trial.cancel_warning_pro.descriptio: If you continue with your purchase, your Pro plan trial will end and you will return to the Free plan.
free_trial.cancel_warning_biz.descriptio: If you continue with your purchase, your Business plan trial will end and you will return to the Free plan.
free_trial.promo.pro.description: Unlock auto image optimization, WAF protection against common attacks, and more.
free_trial.promo.biz.description: Unlock protection against complex bots, machine learning WAF models, and more.
free_trial.promo.button.tooltip: Pay your outstanding invoices to upgrade your domain plan.

free_trial.active_promo.biz.description: %{days} days until your Business plan trial expires.
free_trial.enroll_modal.title.pro: Start your 30 day free trial of the Pro plan now
Unlock enhanced performance and security on the <1>Pro plan</1>
Protect against zero-day and common attacks including OWASP vulnerabilities with WAF
Detect and challenge easy-to-detect bots from any source
Prioritize loading of key site assets
Optimize images to increase site speed with only a couple clicks
Access cache analytics to optimize what is content served by the Cloudflare CDN
free_trial.enroll_modal.pro.sub_descript: <0>Important details:</0> No credit card required to participate in the trial. At the end of your 30 day trial, Pro plan functionality will be removed and your domain will return to the Free plan. Purchase the Pro plan at any time to maintain performance and security capabilities.
free_trial.enroll_modal.title.biz: Start your 30 day free trial of the Business plan now
Unlock enhanced performance and security on the <1>Business plan</1>
Protect against unknown application vulnerabilities with WAF
Protect against zero-day and common attacks including OWASP vulnerabilities with WAF
Optimize images to increase site speed
Access cache analytics to optimize what is content served by the Cloudflare CDN
5x the number of Cloudflare Rules for customization vs. the Free plan
free_trial.enroll_modal.biz.sub_descript: <0>Important details:</0> A credit card is not required to participate in the trial. At the end of your 30-day trial, Business plan functionality will be removed and your domain will return to the Free plan. Purchase the Business plan at any time to maintain its performance and security capabilities.
changes.free_trial_expired.pro.title: Your Pro plan trial has expired
changes.free_trial_expired.pro.descripti: Get back key performance and security capabilities only available on Pro and higher plans.
changes.free_trial_expired.biz.title: Your Business plan trial has expired
changes.free_trial_expired.biz.descripti: Get back key security, reliability, and customization capabilities only available on Business and higher plans.
